items.sentence: Tom needed to store his stuff somewhere, so I told him he could put it in our garage.
Tom said that he didn\'t believe that Mary really planned on going bowling with John.
Tom\'s car was last seen in the neighborhood the day before his ex-wife was murdered.
Tom hoped that the doctors would tell him that he didn\'t need the surgery after all.
Tom still rides the bicycle that his parents gave him when he was thirteen years old.
Tom thought it would be a good idea to start a website that sold nothing but popcorn.
Considering how long I\'ve been studying French, I should be able to speak it better.
Even though I studied French for three years in school, I\'m not good at speaking it.
Don\'t forget to tell Mary that she doesn\'t have to do that if she doesn\'t want to.
Tom had to have his stomach pumped because he had accidentally eaten some rat poison.
There is no other country in the world where earthquakes are as frequent as in Japan.
Thanks to his recommendation, I was able to get a teaching job at a college in Tokyo.
The sounds babies make when they babble seem to contain a lot of anterior consonants.
Tom can't help wondering whether he would've been better off if he'd gone to college.
It would be wise to wait until Tom tells us what he thinks before we make a decision.
You should thank your lucky stars that you didn't get injured any worse than you did.
Tom hadn't done the washing-up for a week, meaning the sink was full of dirty dishes.
Tom left a window open during the storm and now almost everything in the room is wet.
Admittedly, your plan makes sense, but I still think it'll be very hard to carry out.
I hope that you know the last thing I want to do is go there without your permission.
